members.joinCircumstances: Bartolomeo is revealed as the captain of the Barto Club when he enters the Corrida Colosseum.

keyMoments.title: Barto Club Captain Debuts
keyMoments.description: Bartolomeo, captain of the Barto Club, makes his first appearance at the Corrida Colosseum.
keyMoments.significance: Introduction of a crew that will eventually become part of the Straw Hat Grand Fleet.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a rooster comb hairstyle similar to Bartolomeo's

members.joinCircumstances: Hack serves as a combat instructor for the Revolutionary Army.

keyMoments.title: Revolutionary Army Member in Tournament
keyMoments.description: Hack, a member of the Revolutionary Army, participates in the Block B battle, revealing the organization's interest in Dressrosa affairs.
keyMoments.significance: Connects the Corrida Colosseum tournament to the broader Revolutionary Army subplot and hints at their investigation of Dressrosa.

jollyRoger.description: A skull with a left-facing profile wearing a top hat with goggles

members.joinCircumstances: Cavendish is the captain and only known member shown.

keyMoments.title: Cavendish Explains His Grudge
keyMoments.description: Cavendish reveals to Lucy his hatred of the Worst Generation for stealing his fame.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the captain of the Beautiful Pirates' primary motivation in the arc.

ships.shipName: White Horse of the Sleeping Forest

jollyRoger.description: A skull with long flowing hair and rose decorations

name.japanese: チンジャオファミリー

members.joinCircumstances: Don Chinjao is the patriarch of the Chinjao Family.

keyMoments.title: Chinjao Reveals Grudge Against Garp
keyMoments.description: Don Chinjao reveals his history with Garp and his intention to take revenge on Luffy as Garp's grandson.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the Chinjao Family's connection to the old generation and creates conflict with Luffy.
